constream.label: dataset
constream.description: The Dataset to stream to

constream.label: regexp
constream.description: A regular expression to filter the files

constream.label: indefinitely
constream.description: Should we stream waiting for new files?. Defaults to False.

nodes.name: Stream Files
nodes.description: Streams files from a folder to Mikro

outstream.description: The created series in this file

constream.label: stage
constream.description: The Stage in which to put the Image. Defaults to None.

constream.label: era
constream.description: The Era in which to put the Image.. Defaults to None.

constream.label: dataset
constream.description: The Dataset in which to put the Image. Defaults to the file dataset.

constream.label: position_from_planes
constream.description: Whether to create a position from the first planes (only if stage is provided). Defaults to True.

constream.label: timepoint_from_time
constream.description: Whether to create a timepoint from the first time (only if era is provided). Defaults to True.

constream.label: channels_from_channels
constream.description: Whether to create a channel from the channels. Defaults to True.

constream.label: position_tolerance
constream.description: The tolerance for the position. Defaults to no tolerance.

constream.label: timepoint_tolerance
constream.description: The tolerance for the timepoint. Defaults  to no tolerance.

nodes.name: Convert Omero
nodes.description: Converts an Omero File in a set of Mikrodata

constream.label: key
constream.description: The key to use for the metric. Defaults to "max".

nodes.name: Measure Max
nodes.description: Measures the maxium value of an image

instream.label: rep
instream.description: The Image where we should count cells

nodes.name: Maximum Intensity Projection
nodes.description: Projects the image onto the maximum intensity along the z axis

constream.label: key
constream.description: The key to use for the metric. Defaults to "max".

nodes.name: Measure Max
nodes.description: Measures the maxium value of an image

nodes.name: Predict Stardist
nodes.description: Segments Cells using the stardist algorithm

constream.label: rescale_x
constream.description: The physical size of the x dimension

constream.label: rescale_y
constream.description: The physical size of the y dimension

constream.label: rescale_z
constream.description: The physical size of the z dimension

constream.label: ensure_dim_x
constream.description: The size of the x dimension

constream.label: ensure_dim_y
constream.description: The size of the y dimension

constream.label: ensure_dim_z
constream.description: The size of the z dimension

constream.label: crop_method
constream.description: The method to crop the image. Defaults to crop center.

constream.label: pad_method
constream.description: The method to pad the image. Defaults to expand with zeros.

nodes.name: Resize to Physical
nodes.description:
Resize the image to match the physical size of the dimensions,
if the physical size is not provided, it will be assumed to be 1.

Additional dimensions will be cropped or padded according to the
crop_method and pad_method if the ensure_dim is provided

outstream.label: Element ofreturn0
outstream.description: Element ofThe created series in this file

port.label: model
port.description: The model to use for segmentation (maps to arkid-db65a500-23da-4a9d-a3d6-f879399a33b1.model)

port.label: regexp
port.description: A regular expression to filter the files (maps to arkid-0e78ced6-9ed2-4f3c-b951-4f1525876d75.regexp)

port.label: stage
port.description: The Stage in which to put the Image. Defaults to None. (maps to arkid-cebbe0d8-8853-4568-bc39-cec39b74b250.stage)

port.label: era
port.description: The Era in which to put the Image.. Defaults to None. (maps to arkid-cebbe0d8-8853-4568-bc39-cec39b74b250.era)
